LocaleResource.Value: Set limit XXX messages per YY minutes.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Updated
LocaleResource.Value: The smart campaign has been updated successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: Make sure you've tested the smart campaign before sending it out to multiple customers. Save your smart campaign first by clicking "Save" button.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.IsActive.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Indicating whether the campaign is active and nopcommerce will send e-mails in automatic mode using nopcommerce task.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.IsActive.Comment
LocaleResource.Value: Don't forget to activate it for running in automatic mode (nopcommerce task)! This parameter will be ignored if run this campaign manually.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.SmartCampaignType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the type of advertising campaign.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.StartDateTime.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The start date of the order (view order page).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.EndDateTime.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The end date of the order (view order page).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.DontSendBeforeDate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter a specific date and time to send the campaign. Leave empty to send it immediately.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.OnlySubscriber.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Send only to users who have subscribed to receive e-mailings from the site.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.SendOneEmail.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable it the plugin sends ONE email to the customer for this campaign. If the customer purchased several orders he will get ONE email for the first order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.ForAllProduct.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: For all products. Ignore product filter. Example – To everyone who bought any product in the store.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.ForExistingOrders.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enabled - the plugin will send the message in current time for old orders / if you disable it - the plugin will create message only for new orders and create messages with delayed send date in future.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.CustomerViewedTypeId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set Customer Viewed Type Id if you want to filter customer interests from plugin 'General Tracking' using this value. 0 - don't filter.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Fields.ClearMessageDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Clear old sent messages which were sent more than 'xxx' days.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Requirements.ForAllCart.Hint

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Requirements.Operator.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the operator from the list.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.SmartCampaigns.Requirements.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
Set up requirements to a created payment rule if you want to limit it to certain user categories depending on a shipment address or the amount spent, etc. You can use single requirement type, or group several types and apply them simultaneously.
Requirement group is a useful feature for creating payment rule requirement templates. You can create a requirement group just once and then use it every time you want this limitation to be applied. You can include one requirement group into another one if needed.
